dict.string: We need camera access to provide AR form analysis during your workouts.
We need microphone access for voice commands and "Hey Coach" wake word detection.
We need motion data to enhance your workout tracking and form analysis.
We need access to read your health data to provide comprehensive fitness tracking and personalized coaching.
We need access to save your workout data to Apple Health for comprehensive fitness tracking.
We need photo library access to save your workout videos.
